collectible.title: Circular Glasses
collectible.subtitle: Ignatz's iconic pair of glasses.
collectible.text: In a rush to escape this situation, Ignatz's glasses flew off. He was too embarassed to return to them and ran off in a blind daze, most likely into a wall.

collectible.title: Worn Paintbrush
collectible.subtitle: Ignatz's favorite paintbrush.
collectible.text: An old but valued paintbrush owned by Ignatz. He must have dropped it while leaving. Did you steal this? Give it back!
collectible.unlock: Have Ignatz play against his classmates.

collectible.title: Forget-Me-Not
collectible.subtitle: Ignatz's favorite flower.
collectible.text: The forget-me-not that was worn in Ignatz's hair for his summer outfit. It's light blue in color and dotefully cared for. Unlike Fire Emblem Heroes, promise not to forget him, alright?
collectible.unlock: Win against Ignatz in his "Sunshiny Assassin" outfit.

collectible.title: A Portrait of Raphael
collectible.subtitle: Allied “Raphael” gains +20 attack.
collectible.text: A drawing certifying the deep friendship between Ignatz and Raphael. It appears that this year, they swapped outfits for Halloween. How fun!
collectible.unlock: Win against Ignatz in his "Drawn Brawn" outfit.
